yes.translation[0].definitions[0].defini: used as an answer to say that something is true or that you agree
yes.translation[0].definitions[0].exampl: ‘It was a great show.’ ‘Yes, it was.’
yes.translation[0].definitions[1].defini: used as an answer to a question or statement containing a negative, to say that the opposite is true
yes.translation[0].definitions[1].exampl: ‘Sarah isn’t very intelligent, is she?’ ‘Yes, she is  (=in fact, she is intelligent)!’

yes.translation[0].definitions[2].defini: used as an answer to say that you want something or want to do something

yes.translation[0].definitions[3].defini: used as an answer to say that you will do something, or that someone may do or have something

yes.translation[0].definitions[4].defini: used to show that you have heard someone or are ready to speak to someone

yes.translation[0].definitions[6].defini: used to show that you are very excited or happy about something
